name: Mini Super Golf
description:
Mini Super Golf is a minimalist casual platform golf game. 

In each level you have three attempts to hit the goal. The fewer attempts you miss, the more stars you earn. You will need the stars to advance to the next worlds. The game aims to be very simple and fun. 

Features:

- Random procedurally generated levels.

- Varied difficulty.

- Minimalist graphics.

- No ads.

- Easy to play.

More content coming soon!

LATEST VERSION: BETA 1.3

In this version, there is a limited amount of levels. More levels will be available in the next updates. The game is currently at an early development stage.

Your help is very important to make this game more fun! Feel free to send your suggestions and ideas.

Early access versions are now available for desktop (Windows) and mobile (Android).
